participant_1.background:
I'd like to go for a run, but my beer belly is getting in the way.
i am 5 3 an love movie time.
I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
my favorite food to harvest is carrots.
I go for a walk in the park to clear my head and to enjoy the sunshine.

participant_2.background:
My most valuable possession is my Tigers baseball jersey.
I celebrated my birthday by going on a horseback riding trip.
I take care of my health because I want to live a long life to see my children grow up.
I write about my travels and experiences.
I went to the beach and relaxed.

content.text: Happy Birthday! Hope you had a great day!
Thank you so much! My family and I celebrated with a trip to the beach.
How fun! I would love to visit the beach more often. I enjoy swimming and sunbathing.
I love going to the beach too! I just love being in the sun and relaxing.
Have you ever been horseback riding?
Yes, I love horseback riding! I went on a horseback riding trip for my birthday last year.
That sounds like so much fun! I've always wanted to go on a horseback riding trip.
You should definitely go! It's a lot of fun and a great way to see the countryside.
I will have to put it on my bucket list! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to help people find new things to do.
You're the best! I hope you have a wonderful day.
